boons.name: Deadly Strike
boons.description: Your Attack is stronger, with +15% chance to deal Critical damage.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Deadly Flourish
boons.description: Your Special is stronger, with +20% chance to deal Critical Damage.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: True Shot
boons.description: Your Cast seeks foes, with a 10% chance to deal Critical damage.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Unblockable by shield-bearing foes
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Hunter's Flare
boons.description: Your Cast damages foes around you, with a 10% Critical chance.
boons.prerequisites: Unique to Aspect of Beowulf

boons.name: Hunter Dash
boons.description: Your Dash-Strike deals more damage.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Lucifer
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Artemis' Aid
boons.description: Your Call fires a seeking arrow with +35% Critical chance.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Unblockable by shield-bearing foes.
  • Costs 1/5th of the God Gauge per use (while other Gods' Aids cost 1/4th)
  • Max Gauge Bonus - Arrows Fired : 10
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Pressure Points
boons.description: Any damage you deal has a chance to be Critical.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Exit Wounds
boons.description: Your foes take damage when your stuck in them is dislodged.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
  • Cannot be combined with Crystal Beam
  • Cannot be combined with Slicing Shot
  • Cannot be combined with Trippy Shot
boons.prerequisites: Crush Shot, Electric Shot, Flood Shot, Phalanx Shot, or True Shot

boons.name: Hide Breaker
boons.description: Your Critical effects deal even more damage to Armor.
boons.prerequisites: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Pressure Points, or True Shot

boons.name: Clean Kill
boons.description: Your Critical effects deal even more damage.
boons.prerequisites: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Pressure Points, or True Shot

boons.name: Hunter Instinct
boons.description: Your God Gauge charges faster when you deal Critical damage.
boons.prerequisites: Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Pressure Points, or True Shot

boons.name: Hunter's Mark
boons.description: After you deal Critical damage to a foe, a foe near it is Marked.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • Range: 1200
  • 'Marked' effect expires after taking Critical damage.
boons.prerequisites: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Pressure Points, or True Shot

boons.name: Support Fire
boons.description: After you Cast, or hit with an Attack or Special, fire a seeking arrow.
boons.prerequisites: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter Dash, Pressure Points, or True Shot

boons.name: Fully Loaded
boons.description:
Gain extra for your Cast.
  • Max Ammo: +2
boons.prerequisites:
Requires two of three:
  • Exit Wounds, Pressure Points, or Support Fire

boons.name: Heart Rend
boons.description:
Your Critical effects deal even more damage to Weak foes.
  • Bonus Critical Damage vs. Weak: +150%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Artemis: Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter's Flare, or True Shot
  • Aphrodite: Crush Shot, Heartbreak Flourish, Heartbreak Strike, Passion Dash, or Passion Flare

boons.name: Hunting Blades
boons.description:
Your Cast creates a faster Blade Rift that seeks the nearest foe.
  • Seek Duration: 3.3 Sec.
boons.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Freezing Vortex.
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, or Hunter Dash
  • Ares: Slicing Flare or Slicing Shot

boons.name: Deadly Reversal
boons.description:
After you Deflect, briefly gain +20% chance to deal Critical damage.
  • Critical Duration: 2 Sec.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter's Flare, or True Shot
  • Athena: Divine Flourish or Divine Strike

boons.name: Crystal Clarity
boons.description:
Your Cast is stronger and tracks foes more effectively.
  • Beam Damage: +10%
boons.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Cold Embrace
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, or Hunter Dash
  • Demeter: Crystal Beam

boons.name: Splitting Headache
boons.description:
Hangover-afflicted foes are more likely to take Critical damage.
  • Bonus Critical Chance per Hangover Stack: +1.5%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, or True Shot
  • Dionysus: Dionysus' Aid, Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, or Drunken Strike

boons.name: Mirage Shot
boons.description:
Your Cast fires a second projectile, though it has reduced damage.
  • Secondary Shot Damage: 30%
boons.notes: • Cannot be combined with Curse of Drowning
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter's Flare, or True Shot
  • Poseidon: Flood Shot, Poseidon's Aid, Tempest Flourish, Tempest Strike, or Tidal Dash

boons.name: Lightning Rod
boons.description:
Your collectible strike nearby foes with lightning every 1 Sec.
  • Lightning Damage: 70
boons.notes:
• Requires the Infernal Soul Mirror Ability
  • Lowers the range at which you can pick up
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter Dash, Hunter's Flare, or True Shot
  • Zeus: Electric Flare, Electric Shot, Lightning Strike, Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, or Zeus' Aid

curse.name: marked
curse.description: For 2.5 Seconds, victim has a higher chance of taking one Critical damage from any attack.
